entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 04:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: N 20 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
